seo.meta_title: Custom Cabinets & Closets in Montreal | Dilamco
seo.meta_description: Custom cabinet and closet solutions in Montreal. Dilamco designs and installs custom kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanities, and closet organizers to maximize your space.

hero.title: Custom Cabinets & Closets
hero.description: Custom cabinet and closet solutions. Dilamco designs and installs custom kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanities, and personalized storage systems to maximize your space.

items.description: Custom cabinet and closet solutions. Dilamco designs and installs custom kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanities, and personalized storage systems to maximize your space.

items.title: Custom Furniture Creation
items.description: Dilamco designs, manufactures, and delivers all types of custom furniture, according to your needs, dimensions, and desires - without any limits on style, material, or configuration.

items.title: Personalized Residential Furniture
items.description: We create furniture for all rooms in the house: kitchen, bathroom, living room, bedroom, office, entrance... each project is fully customizable.

items.title: Commercial and Professional Furniture
items.description: Dilamco manufactures furniture for stores, offices, restaurants, hotels, and any professional space, adapted to your brand image and space constraints.

items.title: Vanities and Bathroom Cabinets
items.description: We create custom vanities and bathroom cabinets, fully personalized according to your choices of dimensions, finishes, and styles.

items.title: Innovative Storage Systems
items.description: Dilamco designs and manufactures storage systems (closets, wardrobes, cabinets, dressing rooms, under-stair furniture...) optimized for each space.

items.title: Custom Outdoor Furniture
items.description: We create personalized outdoor furniture: benches, pergolas, outdoor kitchens, garden furniture, solutions for terraces and balconies.

items.title: Consultation
items.description: We start with a thorough consultation to understand your needs, preferences, and budget.

items.title: Design
items.description: We create a detailed plan for your project, including dimensions, materials, and finishes.

items.title: Manufacturing
items.description: We manufacture your furniture or installation according to the plans and specifications.

items.title: Installation
items.description: We install your furniture or installation according to the plans and specifications.

highlights.title: The Advantages of Custom Furniture Creation

items.title: Personalization
items.description: You can choose the dimensions, materials, and finishes of your furniture or installation.

items.title: Quality
items.description: We use high-quality materials to guarantee the durability and performance of your furniture or installation.

items.title: Durability
items.description: Our custom furniture is designed to last and withstand the test of time.

items.title: Space
items.description: Our custom furniture is designed to maximize available space.

items.title: Aesthetics
items.description: Our custom furniture is designed to be aesthetic and match your style.

items.title: Price
items.description: Our custom furniture is designed to be affordable and match your budget.
